EdgeCaseAnnotations.FallbackFunction: Accepts Ether with no restrictions, which may lead to accumulation of unexpected funds if Ether is sent mistakenly or by malicious actors.
EdgeCaseAnnotations.WithdrawFunction: Uses tx.origin instead of msg.sender, which introduces potential phishing vulnerabilities as it may be exploited to trick the owner into initiating transactions from another contract.

CommonAttackPatterns.PhishingAttack: The withdrawAll functionâ€™s use of tx.origin makes it vulnerable to phishing attacks, where an attacker can trick the contract owner into calling withdrawAll from a malicious contract.

RecoveryMechanisms: None implemented. An emergency stop mechanism or an owner-only withdrawal method could improve security.
